column4: can anyone help me to get sound working through tvtime, i have a bt878 chipset tv tuner card.
I don't know how to solve your problem, but I just used a convertor to split a headphone jack to RCA.
how is that in the least relevant? and i'm proud of your eighth inch jack > rca skills... you know you can buy a $2 cord for that?
i have a CDDA cable from my card to line in on the mobo.
